Theo nhÃ  váº­t lÃ½ thiÃªn tÃ i Albert Einstein thÃ¬ â€œGenius is 1% talent and 99% percent hard work...â€ "ThiÃªn tÃ i lÃ  1% tÃ i nÄƒng vÃ  99% lÃ  chÄƒm chá»‰".

The way to success is always seriousness and luck. These two terms keep the successful human in the world. Seriousness means â€œhard-workingâ€ while luck has a lot of meaning and one of them is talent. Some ethnic groups argued that we can achieve an easy way to pursue our dream if we have talent. However, there are large of people which have been success with their seriousness like what I quoted from Einstein words â€œGenius is 1% talent and 99% percent hard work...â€. In my opinion, I feel as though with a good work ethic, you can achieve anything, moreover with the collaboration between hard-working and talent that can give plus result to create one achievement.

On the good point of talent view, human who was born with talent and gift commonly achieve their successful which involve with their ability. A famous singer like Beyonce, spanned 16 years her career. She has talented and incredible voice which brought her into artist world. It also creates her to become successful woman with professional ability. This beautiful voice talent facilitates her to success. Another case, there is a genius boy who can answer any formula that is provided by physics subject while others are not really in the class, so he can precede other pupils and easy to get a high result with his talent. It is a positive way to everybody who has a smart talent.

However, the talented ability can be defeated by hard-working. If in the class, there is a boy who smart and talent in physic or history subject, there will a boy who can mastered all lessons only by hard-working. He may fell very dizzy and not understand about any lesson, but if he try to make effort with study hard, he can achieve an excellent grade in each subject.

To sum up, people whose talent, is a greater than whoever not. Beside, to pursue this greater human, people can do a hard work. With hard-working, people always can become the greatest human who have felt many barriers and experiences, also they could have a strong heart and stance because they knew how whole the process that they passed. Talent is luck, while hard-working is important and is needed to create a success life. Talent without hard-working is fruitless.
